actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to require the Nuclear Regulatory Commission to establish consistent procedures for permitting the restarting of nuclear power plants that have been shut down for safety reasons.
short_title: Nuclear Power Plant Safety Act of 1989

summary.text: Nuclear Power Plant Safety Act of 1989 - Directs the Nuclear Regulatory Commission to promulgate regulations in the Federal Register setting out procedures for permitting the restarting of nuclear power plants shut down for safety reasons. Prescribes minimum criteria for such regulations.

titles.title: Nuclear Power Plant Safety Act of 1989
A bill to require the Nuclear Regulatory Commission to establish consistent procedures for permitting the restarting of nuclear power plants that have been shut down for safety reasons.
